attributes.action: Stop MPs sleeping in the Houses of Parliament!
attributes.additional_details: Watch news clips all the time of parliament and it’s happening daily
attributes.background:
Day in day out we the tax payer see on tv MPs asleep in parliament and this must stop! It is an embarrassment 
The speaker of the house must do more to eject or fine MPs caught sleeping

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something that Parliament as a whole is not responsible for.

The Speaker of the House of Commons is responsible for maintaining order in the House of Commons, not the House of Commons as a whole.
